author: Joely
title: Intreasting?
review:
This set is good and bad
Pros:
Cool Head Piece
Nice Chest Plate
Good Gear Movement
Brand New Swords
Bendable Knees
Rhotuka Spinner
Different Sized Arms (Mutant Feel)
Cons:
Rhotuka Spinner Falls Off Easily
The Launcher Sticks Right Through It
Big Feet
Lack of Posibility in Arms
 All in All 8/10

author: Gus_263
title: The green Hordika
review: He have the green color, and the red of the eyes of matau. He have the same colors as metru, and have some pieces of the hordika. The mask looks like a poisoned matau, and his weapons like daggers, with also the same green and silver. The spinner can be launched and losted easily due to it's speed when launched. I rate Matau hordika 5/5.

author: Carl
title: SWEET!
review:
Matau Hordika is one of those Bionicles that is just plain awesome. 

Pros:
Great mask
Arm swiveling mechanism
Cool blades
Rhotuka
Great chest-plate
Feet
Green

Cons:
NONE!

I'm pretty sure everyone knows that nothing is perfect, but Matau Hordika comes really close. Overall he is a really great Bionicle and is a must have for all Bionicle lovers. 5/5!

author: jasonlin1216
title: Old School Bionicle
review:
This set is great and it comes with 2 Rhotuka Spinners. I really recommended this set.
This is also great for Kids. Raging cyclone unleashed! The six Toa Metru returned to the city of Metru Nui, intending to save the sleeping Matoran and bring them to their new home. Ambushed by Visorak spiders, the Toa Metru are mutated into Hordika ... half Toa, half beast! Can they overcome their new enemies and their own bestial natures in time to rescue the Matoran? Half Toa, half monster, Matau must decide between saving the Matoran and saving himself. His fang blades can slice through webs and cables, as well as charge up his Rhotuka wind spinner. New feature! Pull the ripcord to send the Rhotuka spinner flying! Includes instructions to build a Rahi rock raptor with Onua (Brown)!

author: chavez365
title: Great Set!
review:
Matau is really cool! He has a fantastic Rhotuka Spinner that flies really far and two cool weapons that look like swords. His mask/face is pretty cool, and bears a slight resemblance to the mask he wore as a Toa Metru. His colors are nice, and look dark and intimidating. One of his arms moves if you turn a gear, but unfortunately the other is simply a Toa Mata leg. His chest armor is nice, and he has cool leg armor. Now to the pros and cons.
Pros:
Cool mask/face
Spinner goes really far
Looks good
Weapons are nice
Good armor
One arm moves
Cons:
Other arm doesn`t move
Legs aren`t very good
Spinner gets lost a lot and isn`t accurate
Those three minor flaws are hardly anything compared the the positive traits, and overall, I think this is a very good set. If you have the chance to get it, get it!

author: tkettle9719
title: A realistically colored zombie of air!
review:
This is one of the other sets that I got from my parents for my birthday, and one of my favorite Hordika from the series. Its swords are awesome, and it looks menacing.

Pros

  • -The swords are cool, but may be no match for the amazing
  • -Rhotuka Spinner of Aerodynamic amazement. It works extremely well.
  • …

Cons

  • -The mask system used here was invented by haters, though it's favorable to stickers.
  • -The build feels all too familiar. Why?
  • …

This set is really great, and is one of the best and menacing in my collection. I recommend him, Vakama, and Nuju if you want any Hordika.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Toa Hordika) - Toa Hordika Matau Review
review:
This is a great figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 32 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 48 pieces and it was 9 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 19 cents per piece which is a good value for a figure like this.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8740-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be adjusted. On both hands we can see a dagger and on one arm we can also see a gear which you can use to move that arm up and/or down. On the back of the torso is a spinner which flies very well, too.

Summary


All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
